body:
Is it possible to create laminated glass with Sentryglas interlayers by using the EP Construction component? I've had a a lot of success creating IGU's so I'm hopeful I can make laminated glass without just plugging in values for the EP window material component. If it is possible, how would I create a material for the interlayer (as it is not an opaque material, glass material, or air gap)?



Thank you!

Aaron
